title: S13 Ep9: Behind The Secrets of the Beattie Mansion
itunes:title: Behind The Secrets of the Beattie Mansion
description:
Elijah Buchholz and Shawn Holland formed a paranormal group in Kansas called Apex Paranormal. Early in 2016, they were contacted by the caretaker of the Beattie mansion to come investigate the property because they had such wild paranormal activity going on, that they couldn't keep contractors there to finish remodeling projects! After a series of shocking investigations and non-stop paranormal activity, Elijah and Shawn met with the owner of Beattie Mansion and figured out what to do with the property...

http://www.theapexparanormal.com/

https://www.facebook.com/theapexparanormal/
